title: How can musicians survive when all concerts and other cultural events have been cancelled due to the Covid-19 pandemic? - Quora

response.answer_text: That’s certainly an issue which a number of musicians are encountering. A lot of them seem to be performing live on various platforms, selling access to the “gig” (in their house, their garage, their home studio or whatever) into the bargain. Others, I’ve noticed, have been organising for paid downloads or streams of live footage from earlier to become available.
